text: Airway resource cart Alternative equipment for establishing a definitive airway « Specialised ET tubes for blind nasal intubation - a.LMA Fastrach ET tube - b. Parker Flextip ET tube + McCoy laryngoscope + Retrograde intubation kit + Surgical tracheostomy equipment or « Percutaneous dilatational tracheostomy + Alternative laryngoscopes -C-Mac - Glidescope - Airtraq - McGrath (Covidien) -Co-Pilot -AWS « Flexible video stylet (TrachView) + Malleable video stylet - Levitan/Shikani « Rigid video stylet - Bonfils + Flexible scope - A-scope + Fibreoptic - Storz/Pentax/Olympus
